title: Prince Caspian
description: The adventures continue in this fourth book of C.S. Lewis's much-loved series, The Chronicles of Narnia. The Pevensie children are called back to Narnia, where hundreds of years have passed since their last visit, and the once glorious land has fallen to ruin. Together with Prince Caspian and the mighty Aslan, Peter, Susan, Edmund, and Lucy must conquer the evil Telmarines and liberate Narnia.
author: C.S. Lewis
